subject: Reseller
description_text:
Hi my name is Alex Im from South Africa I was wondering how can I become a
resller of your company? Please let me know how to proceed and what you
need from me please

I hope to hear from you soon
Alex

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Jelliman,   Hello Alex, could you please share some information about your sales channels in South Africa? Are they online or offline? Which products are you currently selling, and how is the sales performance?

They are being done offline for now till I can get a website up and running
and the sales been doing good could be better been doing brands like Moza
and logitech a bit of sim magic but only been doing them on order only
sincee I dont really have space to store stock an so on but yeah hope to be
growing more next year and to get a few more manufactures to work with so
yeah its been going good a bit slow but good I want to dip my toes into
products that the other companies does want to do they want to do only high
end I want to go into low to mid end and a bit of high end so hoping to
hear from you soon I have seen a lot of positive reviews of your products.
Hi Alexander Jelliman,  I believe there is no issue with the distributor. You may submit your product requirements to me, and I will arrange for a colleague to coordinate with you.

Thank you very much I would appreciate it alot and I cant wait to start
working with you guys.
Can I ask what your name is please
Hi Alexander Jelliman,  Hello, my surname is Tao.
